TopicTitle: The Name Change Thread (WARNING! ONE TIME ONLY!)

Articles.Content: Are periods okay? I'm thinking a period.

I'm not renaming someone to .

>

Of course not. ![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif ":rolleyes:")  

A period as in "**Mr.**", to be precise. Is that okay?
[@spink00](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/58517-spink00/) Lots of usernames with periods in them already exist. Why don't you just ask for the username you want?

[@Red Iron Crown](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/12858-red-iron-crown/)

I was unaware.

In that case, "Mr. Spink", no quotes, please.
